title: Ted Bundy: Falling For A Killer Interviews His Girlfriend
text:
Photo: Bettmann/Bettmann Archive

Multiple Ted Bundy properties hit the scene at the start of this year, and in 2020, Amazon Prime will bring you yet another examination of the infamous serial killer. Ted Bundy: Falling for a Killer will stream as a five-part docuseries and will include interviews with the murderer’s long-term girlfriend, Elizabeth Kendall, and her daughter, Molly. Both will be opening up about “their experiences with new unsettling details about Bundy, the inconceivable pull he had on women, and an abundant archive of never-before-seen family photos.” Along with the duo, Falling for a Killer will feature women who survived being Bundy’s attacks, including some coming forward with their stories for the first time. The docuseries is timed to debut with an updated edition of Elizabeth Kendall’s 1981 memoir, The Phantom Prince: My Life With Ted Bundy.
description: The new Amazon docuseries ‘Ted Bundy: Falling for a Killer’ will include interviews with his long-term girlfriend and daughter.
